data.title: Instrument Repair in Davenport, IA
data.meta_description: West Music Davenport is home to one of the Midwest's most experienced instrument repair teams! Electronic repair, guitar repair, & more!
data.text:
West Music Instrument Repair and Maintenance in Iowa and Illinois

West Music is home to the Midwest’s largest and most experienced music instrument repair team. Our professional repair technicians provide superior repair services with a helpful and courteous demeanor — all at affordable rates!

Come check out one of our five convenient music equipment repair shops throughout Eastern Iowa and Western Illinois. Our staff of 13 full-time instrument technicians have a wealth of experience and would be happy to help you. If you’re having any problems with your musical instrument or other music equipment, trust the repair experts at West Music to help!

West Music Band and Orchestra Instrument Repair in Davenport, IA

At West Music, we understand that orchestra instruments need to be in tiptop shape. Our music equipment repair services for brass, woodwind, and orchestral string instruments are unparalleled in our region. From a tune-up to a complete overhaul, we work on student, professional and vintage instruments.

Meet our band and orchestra repair staff, or fill out a repair request. Alternatively, bring your instrument into a West Music shop near you to talk face-to-face with one of our practiced maintenance technicians.

Teachers and school staff will be happy to know that our knowledgeable teams can visit most nearby schools weekly, providing easy access to the best instrument maintenance and repair you’re likely to find.

West Music Fretted Instrument Repair in Davenport, IA

West Music’s staff of fretted instrument technicians are renowned for their invaluable experience repairing guitars, basses, mandolins, banjos, and ukuleles from all major manufacturers. We are an Authorized Warranty Service Center for Martin, Fender, Yamaha, and many other brands of guitars, basses, and other fretted musical instruments.

With repair shops located across Eastern Iowa and Western Illinois, we offer quality service, prompt turnaround, and expert maintenance advice. Meet the luthiers, or request a repair to keep your fretted instrument producing beautiful music.

West Music Piano Tuning and Repair in Davenport, IA

West Music provides a full range of piano services for all major brands and models, including tuning; action regulation and voicing through key top replacement; string replacement; and general piano repair.

We work with a team of trusted local piano technicians to tune and service instruments throughout Davenport as well as the greater Eastern Iowa and Western Illinois region.

*Please note that West Music provides fully-covered warranty repair services for instruments purchased through West Music. When providing warranty work for instruments purchased elsewhere, there will be an additional fee attached to cover records searches.
